sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { Message, Transition } from 'semantic-ui-react'

import './msg.scss'

const UiMessage = (props) => (
  <Transition visible={props.msgVisible} animation='browse' duration={500}>
    <Message
      className='leave-msg'
      attached={'top'}
      success
      header='Thank you for your confirmation'
      content='Our Customer Care team will be in touch to conclude your request'
    />
  </Transition>
)

export default UiMessage
